alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Grady; McClain; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 11:32PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Garvin, southeastern Grady, northeastern Stephens and south central McClain Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Lindsay to 4 miles north of Velma. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Purcell, Lindsay, Maysville, Velma, Foster, Antioch, Pernell, Cox City, Erin Springs and Payne. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 92 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
